alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 3:42AM CDT until July 11 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 341 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newcastle to near Blanchard to 3 miles south of Middleberg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newcastle, Blanchard, Tuttle, Goldsby, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Bridge Creek, Middleberg, and Criner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
